problem.markdown:
We have a 2T heat engine that operates between two reservoirs R and S at [mathjaxinline]T_R[/mathjaxinline] and [mathjaxinline]T_S[/mathjaxinline]respectively. It absorbs heat from reservoir S and rejects heat to reservoir R. We connect a conductor between the two reservoirs. In which direction will heat flow through the conductor?
( ) Heat will flow only from R to S. (x) Heat will flow only from S to R. ( ) Heat may flow in either direction. ( ) There will be not be any heat flow through the conductor.
